segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, it's really sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at her anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit excited for them, hoping they get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often, sneaking cookies when their mom isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's face is just so adorable, it makes me happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they share the cookies and enjoy them together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a simple moment, but it brings a smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR
